meanings.definition: A decorative structure surrounding a fireplace.
meanings.sent1: The chimneypieces in the old house were beautifully carved and added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: She placed a vase of flowers on the chimneypieces to brighten up the living room.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the chimneypieces were a perfect spot to hide its toys.
meanings.sent4: The chimneypieces stood tall like guardians of the hearth, watching over the family.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the chimneypieces mesmerized all who entered the room.

meanings.definition: The mantelpiece or mantelshelf above a fireplace.
meanings.sent1: Above the fireplace, the chimneypieces displayed family photos and trinkets.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, stockings were hung from the chimneypieces with care.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf on the chimneypieces seemed to be up to no good.
meanings.sent4: As the fire crackled below, shadows danced on the chimneypieces above.
meanings.sent5: The antique clock on the chimneypieces chimed softly, marking the passage of time.
